name: MySight Module and Reporting+ Training
title: MySight Module and Reporting+ Training
body:
MySight Overview

MySight gives users the power to manage, edit, and customize online dashboards. It includes advanced functionality for data analysts in your organization who can perform an ad-hoc analysis of any of your data. MySight is embedded in the Portals module and therefore can be combined with action management, discussions or even data collection modules. This allows the user to have all feedback-related activities in one place. You can do integration with data reporting tools such as Tableau and publish it to Mysight.

Activities

  • Go over the MySight topic article to get familiar with the module.
  • Create a MySight project in parallel with reviewing the above, to cement your understanding.

Reporting + Overview

EFS Reporting+ is a comprehensive solution for evaluating EFS Survey and People projects. It features intuitive drag-and-drop interfaces and streamlined workflows for efficiency.Â 

Activities

  • Go over the Reporting+ topic article to get familiar with the module.
  • Populate and export a report following How-to: Evaluating Survey Results with Reporting+.
